Posts.Content: Hello, I have been diagnosed with dcis ther location is in my left auxillary area and they took three lymoh nodes for sentinal node biopsy all negative. I am left handed and a massage therapist. I have heard the radiation can causse some serious porblems with arm function as can masectomy. I have had a lumpectomy to date but have to go back in surgery becasue the margins are small. In keeping with the idea i need to use my arm heavilyfor work what would you do?
Posts.Title: MASSAGE THERPAIST WITH DCIS
